title: Examining Consumers’ Pro Environmental Purchase Intention Of Electric Cars: Perspective of Value- Attitude- Behaviour Framework
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Examining Consumers’ Pro Environmental Purchase Intention Of Electric Cars: Perspective of Value- Attitude- Behaviour Framework
detail.abstract: This study examines psychological factors that drive consumers’ pro-environmental purchase intention of electric vehicles (EV), based on the Value-Attitude-Behavior (VAB) framework. While the previous studies focused mainly on rational and cognitive determinants of EV adoption, the roles of pro-environmental self-identity and pro-environmental knowledge in shaping purchase intention remain underexplored, especially in developing countries. Based on survey data from 516 participants in Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi (Vietnam), this study examines how pro-environmental identity (as a value) affects pro-environmental attitude and purchase intention of EV, the mediating effect of pro-environmental attitude, and the moderating role of pro-environmental knowledge. The structural equation modeling results show that pro-environmental identity significantly predicts both pro-environmental attitude and EV purchase intention, with pro-environmental attitude acting as an important mediator. Moreover, pro-environmental knowledge also strengthens the impact of both pro-environmental self-identity and pro-environmental attitude on EV purchase intention. These findings highlight the importance of combining value-based solutions and enhancing pro-environmental knowledge to promote sustainable consumption behaviour. The study provides theoretical insights into the VAB framework and offers practical implications for policymakers and marketers in encouraging EV adoption in emerging markets.

AI.tldr: 本研究基于价值-态度-行为（VAB）框架，探讨了心理因素如何影响消费者购买电动汽车（EV）的环保意愿。研究发现，环保自我认同和环保知识在发展中国家尤为重要，并通过结构方程模型验证了其影响机制。
AI.research_question: 心理因素（如环保自我认同和环保知识）如何影响消费者购买电动汽车的环保意愿？
AI.motivation: 以往研究多关注电动汽车采用的理性和认知因素，而环保自我认同和环保知识的作用在发展中国家尚未充分探讨。
AI.method: 基于越南胡志明市和河内516名参与者的调查数据，采用结构方程模型分析。
AI.findings: 环保自我认同显著预测环保态度和EV购买意愿，环保态度起中介作用；环保知识增强环保自我认同和态度对购买意愿的影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了VAB框架在环保行为中的应用，强调了心理因素的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和营销人员提供了通过价值导向方案和知识提升促进EV采用的策略。

title: Heterogeneous Impacts of Macroprudential Policies: Financial Advisors, Regulatory Caps, and Mortgage Risk
affiliations: National Bank of Slovakia, National Bank of Slovakia, Oesterreichische Nationalbank (OeNB) and Národná banka Slovenska

detail.title: Heterogeneous Impacts of Macroprudential Policies: Financial Advisors, Regulatory Caps, and Mortgage Risk
detail.abstract: This paper examines the impact of borrower-based macroprudential policy tightening on mortgage lending in Slovakia, focusing in particular on the role of financial advisors in shaping loan characteristics. Using a comprehensive loan-level dataset from Slovak banks, we analyze the effects of key regulatory tools — Loan-to-Value (LTV) and Debt-to-Income (DTI) limits — on mortgage risk profiles. Our contributions include: (i) showing that restrictive borrower-based measures (BBMs) reduce the riskiest loans but push lower-risk segments toward regulatory thresholds, thus reshaping the risk profile of the mortgage loan portfolio; (ii) demonstrating that advisor-mediated loans tend to have higher amounts, LTVs, DTIs, and longer maturities, raising their riskiness; and (iii) identifying significant front-loading behavior following policy tightening announcement, particularly for advisor-mediated loans. These findings highlight the importance of detailed micro-level data in capturing policy effects and informing more effective macroprudential regulation.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了斯洛伐克基于借款人的宏观审慎政策收紧对抵押贷款的影响，特别关注金融顾问在贷款特征形成中的作用。研究发现，限制性政策减少了高风险贷款，但将低风险贷款推向监管阈值，同时顾问中介的贷款风险更高。
AI.research_question: 基于借款人的宏观审慎政策收紧如何影响斯洛伐克的抵押贷款风险特征？
AI.motivation: 探讨宏观审慎政策对抵押贷款风险的影响，尤其是金融顾问在其中的作用，以优化政策设计。
AI.theoretical_framework: 宏观审慎政策、贷款风险特征、金融顾问行为。
AI.method: 使用斯洛伐克银行的贷款级数据，分析贷款价值比（LTV）和债务收入比（DTI）限制的影响。
AI.findings: 限制性政策减少高风险贷款，但低风险贷款更接近监管阈值；顾问中介贷款风险更高；政策宣布后存在显著的提前借贷行为。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了宏观审慎政策对贷款风险分布的复杂影响及金融顾问的放大作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了优化宏观审慎政策的微观数据支持。

title: Interpretable and Causal Approach to Estimate Systemic Risk in Indian Banks
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Institute for Development and Research in Banking Technologies and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Interpretable and Causal Approach to Estimate Systemic Risk in Indian Banks
detail.abstract: The failure of one bank might trigger the collapse of other banks that depend on it due to their interconnectedness. The risk associated with the failure of the entire banking network when one of its members collapses is known as systemic risk. Quantifying it is a challenging task due to the complex interconnections among banks, whose data is not always publicly available. In a novel departure from the literature, we employ quantile regression neural networks to estimate value-at-risk (VaR) of banks and use the same to estimate their conditional value-at-risk (CoVaR). We then identify  banks with high systemic risk exposure and contribution using the published metrics. For the first time, (i) we invoke SHapley Additive exPlanations (SHAP) analysis to incorporate explainability aspects in the trained models, (ii) generatecounterfactual scenarios to help decision-makers mitigate systemic risk under the causal inference framework, and (iii) employ the network centrality measures to assess the interconnectedness among the banks. In this work, we use publicly available data to quantify systemic risk in a network of 24 Indian banks from 2019 to 2024. We identify banks with high systemic risk exposure and contribution. We empirically establish the importance of incorporating non-linearity in estimating VaR. Finally, we use the real-world events that occurred in the Indian banking industry between 2019 and 2024 to corroborate our empirical findings.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新方法，通过分位数回归神经网络和SHAP分析，量化银行系统性风险，并识别高风险银行。
AI.research_question: 如何量化银行网络中的系统性风险，并识别高风险银行？
AI.motivation: 银行间的复杂关联性使得系统性风险难以量化，且公开数据有限，需要新方法解决这一问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: 系统性风险理论、分位数回归神经网络、SHAP分析、因果推断框架、网络中心性度量。
AI.method: 使用分位数回归神经网络估计银行VaR和CoVaR，结合SHAP分析和网络中心性度量识别高风险银行。
AI.findings: 识别出印度24家银行中系统性风险暴露和贡献较高的银行，并验证了非线性方法在VaR估计中的重要性。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次将SHAP分析和因果推断框架引入系统性风险研究，提出非线性VaR估计方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为决策者提供反事实场景和网络中心性分析，帮助缓解系统性风险。

title: Memory-Efficient Artificial Intelligence Framework for Real-Time Multivariate Anomaly Detection
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Seoul National University

detail.title: Memory-Efficient Artificial Intelligence Framework for Real-Time Multivariate Anomaly Detection
detail.abstract: The semiconductor industry is rapidly expanding, driven by growing demands in artificial intelligence (AI), cloud computing, the internet of things, and the electrification of automotive and infrastucture. As manufacturing processes grow more complex and dynamic, accurate real-time anomaly detection becomes critical for maintaining yield and reliability. However, conventional statistical methods lack adaptability in dynamic process conditions, while deep learning models are typically too resource-intensive for edge deployment. Herein, we present a lightweight yet robust AI-based anomaly detection framework for real-time, sensor-specific semiconductor manufacturing. Our framework incorporates a four-layer convolutional neural network trained on unsupervised dual-segment inputs with hierarchical layer-wise objectives. Using only 3,783 parameters for 49 input features, the framework achieves 99.90% accuracy and an F1 score of 82.14%, reducing false alarms by up to 10.3 times and 4.0 times compared to the convolutional autoencoder control and industrial statistical model baseline, respectively. We further introduce a computationally efficient method for generating labeled virtual data to enable sensor-wise adaptive thresholding under imbalanced data conditions. Together, these innovations enable accurate and robust real-time fault detection in environments with limited computing resources, and provide a scalable foundation for diverse edge AI applications.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种轻量级且鲁棒的基于AI的实时异常检测框架，用于半导体制造中的传感器特定应用。该框架通过四层卷积神经网络实现高精度和低误报率，并引入虚拟数据生成方法以应对数据不平衡问题。
AI.research_question: 如何在动态复杂的半导体制造过程中实现高精度、低资源消耗的实时异常检测？
AI.motivation: 半导体制造过程日益复杂，传统统计方法缺乏动态适应性，而深度学习模型资源消耗过大，难以在边缘设备部署。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于卷积神经网络的轻量级AI框架，结合无监督双段输入和分层目标训练。
AI.method: 采用四层卷积神经网络，仅需3,783个参数处理49个输入特征，并结合虚拟数据生成方法实现传感器自适应阈值设定。
AI.findings: 框架达到99.90%的准确率和82.14%的F1分数，误报率较卷积自编码器和工业统计模型分别降低10.3倍和4.0倍。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种轻量级AI框架，为动态制造环境中的实时异常检测提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为资源有限的边缘设备提供了高效、可扩展的异常检测解决方案，适用于多样化的边缘AI应用。

title: Research on the Spatial Pattern and Driving Mechanism of Urban Agglomeration in the Upper of the Yellow River
affiliations: Lanzhou Jiaotong University, Northwest Normal University, Lanzhou Jiaotong University, Tongji University, Lanzhou Jiaotong University and Lanzhou Jiaotong University

detail.title: Research on the Spatial Pattern and Driving Mechanism of Urban Agglomeration in the Upper of the Yellow River

keywords: Urban agglomeration in the upper of the Yellow River

detail.abstract: Highlights 1.This study examines the spatial pattern of the upper Yellow River urban agglomeration, characterized by a multi-core, axial, and belt-shaped structure with Lanzhou as the core, and Xining and Yinchuan as sub-centers. It explores economic and ecological linkages via ecological corridors and economic axes. 2.Using regression and geographic detector methods, the study analyzes the interaction of factors such as GDP, market development, external connections, and transportation, proposing a multi-dimensional driving mechanism for regional integration, with a focus on ecological and economic coordination. 3.The research offers policy recommendations for infrastructure development, industrial coordination, and ecological protection, aiming for sustainable development through remote sensing and international cooperation.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析了黄河上游城市群的空间格局（以兰州为核心，西宁和银川为次中心的多核、轴向、带状结构），并通过生态廊道和经济轴探讨了经济与生态联系。采用回归和地理探测器方法，分析了GDP、市场发展、外部联系和交通等因素的交互作用，提出了区域一体化的多维驱动机制，重点关注生态与经济的协调。研究为基础设施发展、产业协调和生态保护提供了政策建议，旨在通过遥感和国际合作实现可持续发展。
AI.research_question: 黄河上游城市群的空间格局及其经济与生态联系的驱动机制是什么？
AI.motivation: 探索黄河上游城市群的空间结构及其经济与生态协调发展的驱动因素，为区域可持续发展提供科学依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 多核城市群理论、生态经济学理论、区域一体化理论。
AI.method: 回归分析和地理探测器方法。
AI.findings: 黄河上游城市群呈现多核、轴向、带状的空间结构；GDP、市场发展、外部联系和交通等因素交互作用显著；生态与经济的协调是区域一体化的关键。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了黄河上游城市群的多维驱动机制，丰富了多核城市群和生态经济协调的理论研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为基础设施、产业协调和生态保护提供了政策建议，支持区域可持续发展与国际合作。

title: The Certifier's Revision Dilemma and Strategic Realignment Blind Spot: An Analysis of the Decline in Adopters after a Standard Revision
affiliations: Aarhus University - Interdisciplinary Center for Organizational Architecture (ICOA)

detail.title: The Certifier's Revision Dilemma and Strategic Realignment Blind Spot: An Analysis of the Decline in Adopters after a Standard Revision

keywords.keywords: Certifier's revision dilemmaNordic Swan EcolabelStandard adoptionStandard revisionStrategic realignment blind spot

detail.abstract: This study analyzes sustainable standard adoption trend. The concept of the certifier’s revision dilemma is introduced to describe the strategic decision situation where the standard-setting organization balances the complexity of the standard and the time given to the adopters to strategically realign with the revised standard. Complexity-time ambiguities and feedback delays result in a strategic realignment blind spot, which causes a decline in adopters following standard revision. A model is developed to simulate standard adoption and strategic realignment dynamics using the case of the standard revision of the Nordic Swan Ecolabel. The model estimates that the gap between the status quo and baseline scenarios is largest in two years after the publication of the revised standard, when adopters will be around a fifth less than they would have been without the revision. A counterintuitive finding is that although many adopters are suspended after revision, most of them are reinstated sooner than expected. The results are used to inform policy options to achieve long-term adoption objectives.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析了可持续标准采用的趋势，提出了“认证者修订困境”概念，探讨标准制定组织在标准复杂性与采用者调整时间之间的权衡。研究发现复杂性-时间模糊性和反馈延迟导致战略调整盲点，降低采用率。通过北欧天鹅生态标签案例模拟，模型显示修订后两年采用率差距最大，但多数暂停采用者会较快恢复。研究结果为政策制定提供参考。
AI.research_question: 标准修订如何影响可持续标准的采用趋势？
AI.motivation: 探讨标准修订对采用者行为的影响，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 认证者修订困境、复杂性-时间模糊性、战略调整盲点。
AI.method: 基于北欧天鹅生态标签案例的模型模拟。
AI.findings: 修订后两年采用率差距最大，但多数暂停采用者会较快恢复。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出认证者修订困境概念，丰富了标准修订理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供优化标准修订策略的建议。

title: Strategic Construction of Initial Datasets for Active Learning: Leveraging Self-Supervised Learning
affiliations: Kookmin University, Kookmin University and Kookmin University

detail.title: Strategic Construction of Initial Datasets for Active Learning: Leveraging Self-Supervised Learning
detail.abstract: Deep learning has demonstrated remarkable achievements across various fields. However, its success heavily relies on the availability of large-scale labeled data. Labeling data is a time-consuming and costly process, prompting numerous studies aimed at reducing these expenses. Active learning is a prominent data-efficient learning methodology that has garnered significant attention. Active learning methods iteratively select data that are most effective for training models, thereby gradually constructing a compact dataset. It typically assumes the presence of a small amount of labeled data at the start of training, and experiments generally use randomly composed initial labeled datasets. Although the importance of initial dataset construction is well recognized because of its impact on the level of model training in most active learning methods, practical research in this area remains limited. In this study, we propose a method of data initialization using self-supervised learning from an active learning perspective. This method focuses on constructing a small initial dataset that maximizes learning efficiency by utilizing an unlabeled dataset. The impact of the proposed method on active learning was evaluated using a representative image classification dataset, which demonstrated significant performance improvements.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于自监督学习的主动学习数据初始化方法，通过利用未标记数据集构建小型初始数据集，显著提升了主动学习的性能。
AI.research_question: 如何通过自监督学习构建高效的初始数据集以提升主动学习的性能？
AI.motivation: 深度学习的成功依赖于大规模标记数据，但数据标注成本高昂。主动学习虽能减少标注需求，但初始数据集的构建对模型训练效果至关重要，而相关研究较少。
AI.method: 提出一种基于自监督学习的数据初始化方法，利用未标记数据集构建小型初始数据集。
AI.findings: 在代表性图像分类数据集上的实验表明，该方法显著提升了主动学习的性能。
AI.theory_contributions: 为主动学习中的初始数据集构建提供了新的理论方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 降低了数据标注成本，提升了主动学习的效率。

title: Women entrepreneurship in Tunisia and Italy: catalyst for economic and social development, motivations and challenges

detail.title: Women entrepreneurship in Tunisia and Italy: catalyst for economic and social development, motivations and challenges
detail.abstract: This Chapter aims to understand the multiple roles of female entrepreneurship as a catalyst for economic and social progress in these two Mediterranean countries. By examining the motivations, challenges and strategies employed by women entrepreneurs, this study aims to contribute to a better understanding of the factors that shape their success and the role they play in promoting inclusive and equitable growth.

AI.tldr: 本章探讨女性创业在地中海两个国家中作为经济和社会进步催化剂的多种角色，分析其动机、挑战和策略，以促进对成功因素及其在推动包容性增长中作用的理解。
AI.research_question: 女性创业在地中海国家中如何作为经济和社会进步的催化剂？
AI.motivation: 理解女性创业的动机、挑战和策略，以揭示其对包容性增长的贡献。
AI.theoretical_framework: 女性创业理论、包容性增长理论。
AI.method: 通过分析女性创业者的动机、挑战和策略进行研究。
AI.findings: 女性创业在推动经济和社会进步中扮演多重角色，并促进包容性增长。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了女性创业和包容性增长的理论研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供支持女性创业、促进包容性增长的建议。

title: Exploring The Value and Path of Farming-Reading Education in Agriculture and Forestry Universities In China
affiliations: Sichuan Agricultural University and Sichuan Agricultural University

detail.title: Exploring The Value and Path of Farming-Reading Education in Agriculture and Forestry Universities In China

keywords.keywords: Farming-reading Education；Talent Development；Knowing and Loving Agriculture

detail.abstract: Farming-reading education serves as a crucial medium for agricultural and forestry universities to strengthen labor education. It allows students to learn about local culture, improve their comprehensive ability of knowing and loving agriculture, and enhance their professional practical abilities. This is of great significance for cultivating socialist builders and successors who are well-rounded in morality, intelligence, physique, aesthetics, and labor. The implementation of farming-reading education in agricultural and forestry universities in the new era is a continuation and inheritance of traditional farming and reading culture, possessing unique ideological, spiritual, social, and educational values. To successfully carry out farming-reading education, agricultural and forestry universities must focus on top-level design, build a strong teaching team, construct a teaching system, emphasize skill improvement, and improve safeguard mechanisms, etc. Only then can the goal of cultivating college students who take the responsibility of strengthening and revitalizing agriculture, enhancing their sense of mission and responsibility in serving the "Agriculture, Rural areas, and Farmers" (hereinafter referred to as the "Three Rural Issues"), and improving their comprehensive ability of learning agriculture，knowing agriculture and loving agriculture and professional practical abilities in studying and serving agriculture be achieved through strengthening farming-reading education.

AI.tldr: 农林院校的耕读教育是加强劳动教育的重要媒介，有助于学生学习本土文化、提升知农爱农综合能力及专业实践能力，对培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义建设者和接班人具有重要意义。新时代农林院校实施耕读教育是传统耕读文化的延续与传承，具有独特的思想、精神、社会和育人价值。为有效实施耕读教育，需注重顶层设计、建设教学团队、构建教学体系、重视技能提升和完善保障机制等。
AI.research_question: 如何通过耕读教育培养农林院校学生的知农爱农综合能力及专业实践能力，并增强其服务“三农”的使命感和责任感？
AI.motivation: 耕读教育是农林院校加强劳动教育的重要途径，对培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义建设者和接班人具有重要意义。
AI.theoretical_framework: 传统耕读文化的延续与传承，以及其思想、精神、社会和育人价值。
AI.method: 注重顶层设计、建设教学团队、构建教学体系、重视技能提升和完善保障机制。
AI.findings: 通过耕读教育可以有效提升学生的知农爱农综合能力及专业实践能力，并增强其服务“三农”的使命感和责任感。
AI.theory_contributions: 深化了对耕读教育在农林院校中作用的理论认识，强调了其思想、精神和社会价值。
AI.practical_contributions: 为农林院校实施耕读教育提供了具体的方法和路径，如顶层设计、教学团队建设和保障机制完善等。

title: Does ESG Information Disclosure Greenwashing Affect Corporate TFP? Evidence from Text Similarity Analysis Based on the Tf-Idf Algorithm
affiliations: Baoji University of Arts and Sciences and Baoji University of Arts and Sciences

detail.title: Does ESG Information Disclosure Greenwashing Affect Corporate TFP? Evidence from Text Similarity Analysis Based on the Tf-Idf Algorithm

keywords.keywords: China；ESG information disclosure；Social responsibility report；Total factor productivity；Greenwashing

detail.abstract: A B S T R A C TBased on the data of A-share listed companies from 2009 to 2022, this paper employs the TF-IDF algorithm to quantify the degree of ‘greenwashing’ in corporate ESG (environmental, social, and corporate governance) disclosure and explore its relationship with total factor productivity (TFP). Compared with traditional ESG rating methods, the TF-IDF algorithm can effectively overcome the limitations of subjectivity and strategic disclosure, and accurately identify the ‘greenwashing’ behavior of corporate ESG disclosure through text mining technology. The results of this study show that there is a significant negative impact between the degree of ‘greenwashing’ in corporate ESG disclosure and TFP, which is more obvious in companies with CEOs who have no overseas experience and high financing constraints, and that an increase in the proportion of shares held by institutional investors is an important potential path to alleviate the negative impact between the two. This paper enriches the economic consequences of ‘greenwashing’ of corporate ESG disclosure and provides a theoretical and practical basis for enterprises to improve TFP and practice the concept of high-quality development.

AI.tldr: 本文基于2009-2022年A股上市公司数据，使用TF-IDF算法量化企业ESG披露中的‘漂绿’行为，并探讨其与全要素生产率（TFP）的关系。研究发现‘漂绿’程度与TFP显著负相关，且机构投资者持股比例增加是缓解这一负向影响的重要路径。
AI.research_question: 企业ESG披露中的‘漂绿’行为如何影响其全要素生产率（TFP）？
AI.motivation: 传统ESG评级方法存在主观性和策略性披露的局限，本文通过TF-IDF算法和文本挖掘技术更准确地识别‘漂绿’行为，填补相关研究空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于信息不对称理论和信号传递理论，探讨企业ESG披露的真实性与TFP的关系。
AI.method: 采用TF-IDF算法量化‘漂绿’程度，并结合面板数据回归分析其与TFP的关系。
AI.findings: ‘漂绿’程度与TFP显著负相关，且CEO无海外经验和高融资约束的企业中更明显；机构投资者持股比例增加可缓解这一负向影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了企业ESG‘漂绿’行为的经济后果研究，为信息不对称理论和信号传递理论提供了新证据。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业提升TFP和践行高质量发展理念提供了理论和实践依据，建议通过增加机构投资者持股比例缓解‘漂绿’的负面影响。

title: Pft-Net: Progressive Feature-Tiling Network for High-Fidelity Point Cloud Completion Under Real-World Degradation Anonymous
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Pft-Net: Progressive Feature-Tiling Network for High-Fidelity Point Cloud Completion Under Real-World Degradation Anonymous
detail.abstract: Incomplete point clouds, caused by occlusion, limited sensor resolution, and real-world degradation, remain a critical challenge in 3D vision tasks such as reconstruction and object recognition. To address this, we propose PFT-Net (Progressive Feature-Tiling Network), a novel approach that progressively restores missing geometry while preserving high-fidelity structural details. The network employs a Feature Tiling Mechanism that integrates locally observed points with the stacked center coordinates of missing regions, guiding the completion process without compromising observed structural information. Additionally, a dedicated Patch Feature Integration module aggregates multi-scale local and global features, significantly enhancing reconstruction accuracy. To better reflect real-world conditions, we introduce the Degradation Dataset, simulating occlusion and distance-induced sparsity commonly observed in practical 3D sensing scenarios. Extensive experiments on multiple datasets, including PCN, ShapeNet-55, KITTI, and the proposed Degradation Dataset, show that PFT-Net significantly outperforms state-of-the-art methods in accuracy, completeness, and generalization. Notably, PFT-Net achieves a 4.1% increase in F-Score and a 19.8% reduction in CD-l2 on the Degradation Dataset, as well as a 5.0% improvement in F-Score and a 13.3% reduction in CD-l2 on the PCN dataset. These results demonstrate the robustness of PFT-Net in handling incomplete and degraded point clouds, offering a powerful solution for real-world 3D completion tasks.

AI.tldr: PFT-Net是一种渐进式特征平铺网络，用于修复不完整的点云数据，通过特征平铺机制和多尺度特征整合模块显著提升重建精度，并在多个数据集上优于现有方法。
AI.research_question: 如何在不损害已有结构信息的情况下，有效修复不完整的点云数据？
AI.motivation: 不完整的点云数据（如遮挡、传感器分辨率限制和现实退化）是3D视觉任务中的关键挑战，亟需一种既能恢复缺失几何又能保留高保真结构细节的方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 特征平铺机制（Feature Tiling Mechanism）和多尺度局部与全局特征整合模块（Patch Feature Integration module）。
AI.method: 提出PFT-Net，通过渐进式特征平铺和多尺度特征整合，结合新提出的Degradation Dataset模拟现实退化情况。
AI.findings: PFT-Net在多个数据集上显著优于现有方法，如Degradation Dataset上F-Score提升4.1%，CD-l2降低19.8%；PCN数据集上F-Score提升5.0%，CD-l2降低13.3%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种新的特征平铺机制和多尺度特征整合方法，为点云修复任务提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: PFT-Net为现实中的3D点云修复任务提供了高效解决方案，尤其在处理遮挡和退化数据时表现优异。

title: Crafting Change: Developing Behaviour Change Communication Intervention Package for Improved Household Waste Segregation in Urban India
affiliations: Ruxmaniben Deepchand Gardi Medical College, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) - National Institute of Epidemiology, Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) - National Institute of Epidemiology, Central University of Kerala, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Ruxmaniben Deepchand Gardi Medical College, Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) - National Institute of Epidemiology, Ruxmaniben Deepchand Gardi Medical College, Ruxmaniben Deepchand Gardi Medical College, Karolinska Institutet, Karolinska Institutet, University of Borås, Government of India - ICMR-Regional Medical Research Centre and Karolinska Institutet

detail.title: Crafting Change: Developing Behaviour Change Communication Intervention Package for Improved Household Waste Segregation in Urban India
detail.abstract: Solid waste management is critical for achieving a circular economy, with household-level waste segregation being a key component. However, behaviour change strategies are often underprioritized in intervention planning, and their development is rarely well documented, limiting transparency, replication, and contextual adaptation. This study presents the systematic development of a Behaviour Change Communication (BCC) intervention designed to support community volunteers in promoting household waste segregation in a cluster-randomised controlled trial (RCT) in urban India. Guided by the Behaviour Change Wheel (BCW) and the GUIDED reporting framework, we integrated findings from IEC material reviews, 18 key informant interviews, focus group discussions, co-design workshops, and expert consultations. Barriers were analysed using the Motivation-Opportunity-Ability-Behaviour (MOAB) model, and APEASE criteria informed intervention design. Key strategies included education, persuasion, enablement, and environmental restructuring. The final BCC package included volunteer flipbooks with scripts and visuals, printed IEC materials, household segregation bins, and interactive tools such as games and themed activities. These materials were field-tested and iteratively refined with stakeholder input. This participatory and theory-informed approach provides a replicable model for low-resource urban settings and contributes to advancing sustainable waste management through community-led communication strategies.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过系统开发行为改变沟通（BCC）干预措施，支持印度城市社区志愿者推动家庭垃圾分类，采用行为改变轮（BCW）和GUIDED报告框架，结合多种研究方法，设计出包含教育、说服、赋能和环境重构等策略的BCC工具包。
AI.research_question: 如何通过行为改变沟通（BCC）干预措施有效支持社区志愿者推动家庭垃圾分类？
AI.motivation: 家庭垃圾分类是实现循环经济的关键，但行为改变策略在干预规划中常被忽视，且缺乏系统记录，限制了透明度和适应性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 行为改变轮（BCW）、GUIDED报告框架、动机-机会-能力-行为（MOAB）模型和APEASE标准。
AI.method: 结合IEC材料审查、18次关键信息提供者访谈、焦点小组讨论、共同设计研讨会和专家咨询，采用集群随机对照试验（RCT）。
AI.findings: 开发了包含志愿者翻页书、印刷材料、分类垃圾桶和互动工具（如游戏和主题活动）的BCC工具包，并通过实地测试和利益相关者反馈迭代优化。
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了基于理论和参与式方法的可复制模型，推动可持续废物管理的社区主导沟通策略。
AI.practical_contributions: 为低资源城市环境设计了一套实用的BCC工具包，支持社区志愿者推动垃圾分类行为改变。
